attributes.additional_details:
Millions of  houses and flats  only have  an Electricity supply.   They do not have  Gas  as well.

It is extremely annoying  to see consumers  who have a bigger choice  getting  a "dual fuel discount"

Please therefore order  Electricity suppliers   to offer a Single fuel discount  of 25%    and also give rebates  to  electricity only  households   to compensate  them   for  being over charged in the past?
